mapper.sql: ID, ORGNO, BINDID, CREATEDATE, CREATEUSER, UPDATEDATE, UPDATEUSER, WORKFLOWID, WORKFLOWSTEPID, ISEND, UID2, UNAME2, WFRANGE
mapper.insert:
select BO_AWS_COMMISION_SEQ.nextval from dual
insert into BO_AWS_COMMISION_S (ID, ORGNO, BINDID, CREATEDATE, CREATEUSER, UPDATEDATE, UPDATEUSER, WORKFLOWID, WORKFLOWSTEPID, ISEND, UID2, UNAME2, WFRANGE ) values (#{id}, #{orgno}, #{bindid}, #{createdate}, #{createuser}, #{updatedate}, #{updateuser}, #{workflowid}, #{workflowstepid}, #{isend}, #{uid2}, #{uname2}, #{wfrange} )

where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
